item.name: get BTM rep by parent username

body.raw:
{
  "parentUsername": "parent",
  "children": [
    {
      "firstName": "Jane",
      "lastName": "Smith",
      "email": null,
      "consentsToEmails": false,
      "address": {
        "firstLine": "string",
        "secondLine": "string",
        "townCity": "string",
        "postCode": "string"
      },
      "receivesFreeSchoolMeals": true,
      "hasAdditionalNeeds": true,
      "additionalNeeds": "string",
      "hasAllergies": true,
      "allergies": "string",
      "consentsToPhotoVideoStorage": true,
      "emergencyContactName": "string",
      "emergencyContactNumber": "string",
      "schoolName": "string"
    }
  ]
}
